biotools.summary: NeuroDebian is a popular turnkey platform for Neuroscience, where software is integrated, tested, and delivered conveniently and reliably so you could concentrate on your research and not on "system maintenance". It provides a large collection of popular neuroscience research software for the Debian operating system as well as Ubuntu and other derivatives.
